data.text:
Donation Line: 410-307-1721

Request and Contest Line: 410-307-1683

General Info:

General inquiries can be sent to [email protected] or by calling 410-484-8938.

Membership or Sponsorship:

Questions about donations/membership can be sent to [email protected] or by calling 410-735-1610.

To sponsor WTMD programming, please email Michele Williams [email protected] or call 410-235-1617.

To participate in First Thursdays, check out our information page or email [email protected].

Each of these mailboxes is monitored daily and emails are forwarded to the appropriate person. While we try to respond to all emails, we do get a lot of inquires so please give us 72 hours if your email requires a response.

Music submissions:

National bands and artists should send two hard copy CDs to the WTMD office along with two full media kits including your contact information. Do not drop off at the station! You must mail.

Your kit should include, if possible, a list of shows played and other material that will help us get to know your band. In lieu of a hard copy CD, you may direct us to a .wav format download of your music. MP3 files are not acceptable for airplay. We regret that, due to the large volume of material we receive, we cannot confirm the receipt or the airplay of unsolicited material.

Baltimore & Maryland bands â€” to be considered for airplay in regular rotation, send links to your songs along with information about your music and yourself to [email protected]

Mailing Address: WTMD, 2216 North Charles Street, Baltimore, MD 21218
